resources.string: RingyDingyDingy needs device administration privileges to enable remote locking. Please accept this if you want to lock your device remotely.
The activation log is already empty.
Are you sure you want to clear the activation log?

Welcome to RingyDingyDingy!

To perform a remote ring, send:
"rdd <code>"
to this device, without quotes.

To stop a remote ring, send:
"rdd <code> stop"

<remote_lock><pager>

<log>

To change your activation code, available commands, and enabled triggers (ways to send commands to RingyDingyDingy)<settings>
Activation logging is enabled. To see the activation log, <instructions>
press Menu and tap View Log.
tap the eye icon on the action bar.
To send a page to this device, send:\n\"<pager_code> (message to display)\"

To perform a remote lock, send:
"rdd <code> lock"
, tap the Settings icon on the action bar.
Allows the application to add new commands to RingyDingyDingy.
Used exclusively by RingyDingyDingy for internal commands.
Allows the application to execute RingyDingyDingy commands.
The toggle notification lets you quickly enable/disable RingyDingyDingy
Tap to disable logging when a command is activated, who activated it, and what app was used
Tap to enable logging when a command is activated, who activated it, and what app was used
Tap to change the maximum number of log entries to keep (currently <count>)
Sorry, your code wasn\'t valid. It cannot contain spaces. Please try again.
Enter a new pager activation code below. Note that it cannot contain spaces.
Tap to set a new pager activation code
Tap to disable receiving pages (uses a separate activation code)
Tap to enable receiving pages (uses a separate activation code)
Please note that you MUST deactivate remote locking before uninstalling RingyDingyDingy! Keeping it active will give the error \"Uninstall not successful.\"
Tap to generate a new random code
Tap to disable Google Voice activation
Tap to enable Google Voice activation
Tap to disable sending replies to text messages
Tap to enable sending replies to text messages

Please enter your new activation code. It must be between four and eight characters (letters, numbers, and symbols) long and cannot contain spaces. Please note that anyone with access to your device can view your code at any time, so don\'t use anything secret like a PIN code!
Sorry, your code wasn\'t valid. It must be between four and eight characters (letters, numbers, and symbols) long and cannot contain spaces.
Tap to type in your own activation code
Remote ring has been initiated by
Send \"RingyDingyDingy <code> <cmd>\". <cmd> is one of: help, lock, ring, stop.
Sorry, but I can\'t do a remote lock. Remote locking needs Android 2.2 (Froyo) or newer.
Sorry, but I can\'t do a remote lock. Remote locking is disabled.
Your page has been sent successfully.
The remote ring has been initiated. Send \"RingyDingyDingy <code> stop\" to stop the remote ring.
Sorry, but I can\'t start a remote ring. A remote ring has already been initiated.
The remote ring has been stopped.
Sorry, but I can\'t stop the remote ring. No remote ring was initiated.
Unknown command. Please send \"RingyDingyDingy <code> help\" for a list of commands.
